name: My Super Defender
description:
My Super Defender is a fun arcade game in the medieval setting. You're the knight who should save to save the Christmas in a small kingdom!
You will need to prevent invation and don't allow enemies to get through the red line and at the same time not die. Some opponents attack a player in melee or ranged combat, useful bonuses such as "acceleration", "increase in damage", "treatment" and "restoration of defense" drop out of killed enemies.

The game supports the hotseat mode on one screen, you able to play with your friend by using the XBOX 360 / Steam Controller / WASD keys / Arrows keys. You could play together even if there is no second input device - one keyboard is enough!Features:
  • You have to overcome the path to the Christmas tree and protect it from the raids of evil opponents
  • Fascinating dynamic gameplay
  • A nice and simple Christmas story.
  • Various boosters and improvements dropped from enemies
  • Ability to play with a friend on the one screen
